description:
As soon as Parn, Spark, and their friends land in Marmo, they find themselves separated by Karla’s trap. While the forces of Lodoss set out to give their support, the dragon Narse awakens in Marmo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le débarquement... La terrifiante Île Sombre
上陸... 恐るべき暗黒の島
